MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G21 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Keppochill Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:53pm. Our engineers have arrived at the Springburn Road North substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:15pm on Monday, 29 March 2021
